name: The Heard
description:
In the dungeon dark they dwell

Thrown into an abandoned dungeon by forces unknown, Roland navigates the deadly depths in hope of escaping his stone prison.

FEATURES:

  • A retro 2D side scrolling pixel horror adventure.
  • Use light and dark to avoid or repel your foes.
  • Listen to survive.
  • Multiple Endings.

This experience lasts for approximately one hour. Headphones may be required as left and right audio channels may be integral for Roland's survival.  There is no save.  Pressing Escape immediately terminates the game. 

Good luck.

Minimum System Requirements

CPU: Dual Core 2.0 GHz, RAM: 2 GB RAM, GPU: 512 MB card capable of shader 3.0, DX: Version 9.0c, OS: Windows Vista or later, STO: 250 MB available space, Sound: DirectX 9c Compliant

WARNING:
Consult your doctor before playing video games if you have an epileptic condition.
